title: Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison
description: The graduation ceremonies for the largest class of Imperial cadets since the forming of the Empire suddenly become host to a lightning-fast terrorist strike against the Emperor and Darth Vader. As stormtroopers are nearly wiped out by the unexpected onslaught, and Vader rises to fight through the chaos, one cadet, the wounded Laurita Tohm, joins the battle at Vader's side...beginning a journey that will show him how to succeed in the Empire, and how to fail.Through Tohm's incident report, the facts behind the insurrection are revealed, as he, Darth Vader, and Moff Trachta race to preserve their Empire and the life of their Emperor, traveling to the fallen Jedi Temple, into the past of Anakin Skywalker, and across the galaxy to the secret, hidden Ghost Prism...
author: W. Haden Blackman
